sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ParticipantsService, Participant } from '../participant.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-participant-register', templateUrl: './participant-register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./participant-register.component.css'] }) export class ParticipantRegisterComponent { participant: Participant = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', user: { username: '', password: '' } }; message = ''; constructor(private service: ParticipantsService) {} register() { this.service.register(this.participant).subscribe({ next: res => this.message = res.message, error: err => this.message = err.error }); } }

Register Participant

Name is required
Valid email is required
Phone number is required
Username is required
Password is required
{{ successMessage }}
{{ errorMessage }}
